title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 375-6.1 - Purpose; applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 375-6.1 - Purpose; applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart applies to the development and implementation of the remedial
programs for soil and other media set forth in Subparts 375-2 through 375-4 of
this Part. (b) This Subpart
includes the soil cleanup objective tables developed pursuant to ECL
27-1415(6). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
375-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
